scripts.dev: pnpm run build:root && pnpm exec wrangler dev --persist-to ./.wrangler/state --config wrangler.root.jsonc --env local --port ${PORT:-3100}
scripts.deploy:root: pnpm run build:root && pnpm exec wrangler deploy --config wrangler.root.jsonc
scripts.lint: biome check src scripts vite.config.ts tsconfig.json drizzle.config.ts vitest.config.ts postcss.config.mjs
scripts.format: biome check --write src scripts vite.config.ts tsconfig.json drizzle.config.ts vitest.config.ts postcss.config.mjs
scripts.db:d1:migrate:local: wrangler --config wrangler.root.jsonc d1 migrations apply vidgen_app --local
scripts.db:d1:list:local: wrangler --config wrangler.root.jsonc d1 migrations list vidgen_app --local
scripts.db:d1:migrate:remote: wrangler --config wrangler.root.jsonc d1 migrations apply vidgen_app --remote
scripts.db:d1:list:remote: wrangler --config wrangler.root.jsonc d1 migrations list vidgen_app --remote
scripts.dev:stack:restart-burner: pnpm dev:stack:rebuild-burner && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d burner-ffmpeg
scripts.dev:stack:restart-remotion: pnpm dev:stack:rebuild-remotion && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d renderer-remotion
scripts.dev:stack:restart-downloader: pnpm dev:stack:rebuild-downloader && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d media-downloader
scripts.dev:stack:restart-all: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build burner-ffmpeg renderer-remotion media-downloader && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d burner-ffmpeg renderer-remotion media-downloader
